```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(rio)
```

```{r}
Schooling <- import(here("data","Schooling.csv"))
```

```{r}

Schooling %>%
  mutate(mean_par_ed = mean(momed+daded))

Schoolingsub <- Schooling %>%
  select(rownames,ed76, daded, momed, wage76, iqscore, age76, nearc2, nearc4, nearc4a, nearc4b)

Schoolingsub %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = 8:11,
    names_to = "nearc",
    values_to = "Y/N",
    values_transform = list(result = as.character))
```
